Meituan Privacy Policy
Update date: March 14, 2022
label: Policy Change

text: Effective date: March 21, 2022
label: Policy Change

text: Meituan (following or "we") pays great attention to protecting the personal information and privacy of users ("you"). We know the importance of personal information to you, and will take the laws and regulations and the industry's mature security standards.Corresponding security measures to protect your personal information.
We hope to clearly introduce you how to deal with your personal information and protect you when using our products/services through this privacy policy.
This policy will help you understand the following:
1. How do we collect and use your personal information
2. How do we use cookies and similar technologies
3. How can we share, transfer, and publicly disclose your personal information
4. How do we save and protect your personal information
5. How do you manage your personal information
6. Protection of personal information of minors
7. Notification and revision
8. How to contact us
Nine, Appendix
[Special Tips] Please read and fully understand this "Privacy Policy" (the key content has bolded the fonts, please pay special attention to the use of the products/services we provided by us.
Once you use or continue to use our products/services, it means that you agree that we will process your relevant information in accordance with this privacy policy.
label: Policy Change
Important
Risk
rewrite: When you use or continue to use our products/services, it means to process your relevant information in accordance with this privacy policy.

text: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, you can contact us through the way how to contact us in this privacy policy).

Meituan's product/service is the product/service provided by Beijing San Kuang Technology Co., Ltd. (registered address: 1202-34, 12th floor 1202-34, No. 27, Zhongguancun Street, Haidian District, Beijing) and its related parties provided to you through the following channels:Including but not limited to clients such as Meituan website (www.meituan.com, www.dianping.com), Meituan App/Public Review APP and other clients, as well as related WeChat open platform accounts or applets.
label: Contact Information

text: For certain specific products/services, we will also formulate a separate privacy policy to explain the special policies of these products/services.
If the relevant privacy policy is inconsistent with the privacy policy, the specific privacy policy is applicable.

The Meituan and its related parties referred to this policy refer to the only name or collective name of Beijing San Kuang Technology Co., Ltd., Beijing San Kuang Online Technology Co., Ltd. and the existing and/or future related related related companies.

Please note that this policy is not applicable to other third -party products/services connected by your products/services ("Other third parties", including your trading counterparty, any third -party website, and third -party service providerWait), please refer to the privacy policy or similar statement of the third party.
1. How do we collect and use your personal information
When you use our products/services, you need/you can choose to authorize us to collect and use personal information.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 1. In order to provide you with the basic functions of our product/service, you need to authorize us to collect and use the necessary information. If you refuse to provide the necessary information, you will not be able to use our product/service normally;
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 2. In order to provide you with the expansion function of our product/service, you can choose to authorize us to collect and use information. If you refuse to provide the aforementioned information, you will not be able to use related additional functions normally or to achieve the functional effects we intend to achieve, But it does not affect your basic functions of using our products/services normally.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: (1) You need to authorize us to collect and use personal information.
We will follow the principles of legitimate, legal, and necessary, and use your personal information for the following purposes described in this policy.
label: Usage
First Party Collection Information

text: 1. Help you become our user

In order to comply with the requirements of laws and regulations, and to provide you with more convenient services, when you are registered as a US group user, you need to provide at least mobile phone numbers to create Meituan account and improve the relevant network identity information (such as avatars, nicknames, nicknamesAnd login password, etc.);
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When you register as a Meituan user, you need to provide mobile phone numbers to create Meituan account and improve network identification information.

text: If you only need to use browsing, search and other functions, you don't need to register as our users and provide the above information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: You can use browsing, search and other functions without registering as a user.

text: In the process of providing account information, if you are willing to add additional personal information, it will help us provide you with more personalized services: including your gender, birthday, residence, hometown, preferences, family information, etc.Essence
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: You can add personal information such as gender, birthday, residence, hometown, etc., so that we can provide personalized services.

text: If you do not provide such information, it will not affect your basic functions of Meituan services.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: If you choose to log in with a third -party account, we will obtain the account information you shared (such as avatars, nicknames, regions, gender and other information, etc.) from third parties to your Meituan account for quick login. We willAccording to the agreement with the third party, use your personal information on the premise of complied with relevant regulations.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When registering and logging in with a third -party account, access and collect your personal information after your authorization, and bind it.

text: 2. Provide you with geographic location -based information display

In order to provide you with the display and search service of the surrounding food, drinking, and travel information, and improve our service performance, efficiency and functions, we authorize us to collect relevant information you generate in the process of using our service, including:
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect the relevant information that you generate in the process of using our service, thinking that you provide information display and search services.

text: (1) Location information.

When you authorize the positioning function of the mobile device with the system and use the service -based services, we will collect and use your location information to recommend the surrounding life services (for example, you do not need to enter the geographical location where you can enterRelated services, estimated the actual distance between the merchant and you facilitates you to make consumer decisions, recommend the service category and preferential information of nearby for you).
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect and use your location information to recommend your surrounding life services.

text: Sensor information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Use IP addresses, GPS Bluetooth and base stations, sensor information and other technologies to obtain your location information.

text: You may also contain corresponding geographical information in the information provided by the service, such as the area information set in the account information or the picture of the picture you uploaded, the geographical mark information in the video.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: You may also contain corresponding geographical information in the information provided in the service.

text: You can turn off the positioning service in the mobile device system to stop our collection of information on your location, but it may not be able to use the services we provide for you based on geographical location, or to achieve the expected effect of related services.
label: Edit/Control
Important
rewrite: You can close the positioning service to stop our collection of information on your location.

text: (2) Log information.

When you use the products/services we provide, we will collect information from browsing, searching, clicking, collecting, collecting, trading, after -sales, attention, sharing, release and other information as related online logs, including you, including youThe IP address, the type of browser, the language used, the version of the operating system, the date and time of access, the telecommunications operator, and the network request.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you use the products/services we provide, collect your browsing, search and other information as related online logs.

text: (3) Sensor information.

When you use our product/service process, we may collect your sensor information to adapt your device status or identify your actions when you choose to participate in the event.It will be used in specific scenarios.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you use our products/service, collect your sensor information to adapt to your device status.

text: For example, in the "sweeping" scene, judge the dark environment through the light sensor to show you whether to choose to turn on the flash or adjust the brightness;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: In the "sweeping" scenario, the dark environment is judged by light sensor in order to show whether to choose to turn on the flash or adjust the brightness.

text: For another example, when you play videos or participate in interactive activities, adapt to the horizontal and vertical screen status of the device through sensors such as gravity, acceleration, gyroscope, etc. or show you the next interactive scenario.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you play videos or participate in interactive activities, you can adapt to the horizontal and vertical screen status through sensors such as gravity, acceleration, gyroscope.

text: 3. Provide you with reservation, ordering, order management functions

When you book/place orders, leisure and entertainment, life services, attractions, movie tickets, beautiful people, sports fitness, marriage, parent -child, pet, medical and other services such as it areInformation (name, gender, phone number, etc.), address information (such as house administration services), service preferences (such as the number of dining people, etc.), etc.

First Party Collection Information

text: You booked/placed an order ticket, train ticket, car ticket, hotel, attraction tickets, homestay travel, medical treatment, student exclusive specialty services such as mobile phone cards or visas, or you may need to be based on services such asRelevant laws and regulations and relevant parties (tickets, hotels, travel agencies, and its agents, etc.) provide your real -name identity information (including but not limited to your ID card, officer card, passport, driver's license, student ID, etc.Certificate photos, photocopies, numbers, etc.), contact information (name, gender, phone number, etc.), email address (for confirmation order information, etc.), personal photos (for first diagnosis, etc.)Contact person information and so on.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When you book/order air tickets, train tickets, car tickets and other businesses on Meituan, you may need to provide your real -name identity information, contact information, email address, personal photos, etc.

text: To show you the order information of your account and facilitate the management of your order information, we will collect the order information you generate during the use of our service.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage

Please be careful to display or provide them outside.When displaying order information, try to identify the processing on the basis of ensuring information availability.

Data Security

text: 4. Provide you with collection, attention, sharing, and recommendation functions

In order to facilitate your management of your own preferences, find users or communities with common hobbies, get a easier access experience, and share with friends and third parties.You can also share information with third parties through functional components. We will collect the log information you generated in the use of the above functions to display, realize online management, initiate sharing, and recommend to you with common hobbies on your personal homepage.User and other.

First Party Collection Information

When you use the corresponding features on Meituan involving delivery (such as takeaway delivery)/replacement (such as invoice mail)/running legs (such as help buying and helping) services, you need to provide the name of the collection/consignee's name and gender (with gender (with gender (use it with gender (use it with gender (use it with gender (use it.When the delivery staff contacts you, such as Ms. Liu, such as Ms. Liu), mobile phone number, receiving address, house number, etc., it can be facilitated that your order can be delivered and completed safely and accurately.

text: 6. Provide you with information release functions such as writing reviews, strategies, punch cards

text: 8. Help you complete the payment

When you pay for order on Meituan, you can choose Meituan and its related parties (such as Meituan Pay) or Meituan's third -party cooperation agencies (such as WeChat Pay, QQ Wallet, Apple, Pay, Alipay and other partners) and other partners)Pay the service provided.

Important
First Party Collection Information

We will provide the corresponding options during your payment process. At the same time, you will alsoYou can choose to pay for other methods such as passwords, SMS verification codes.

Important

text: During the payment process, we only collect the verification results without collecting your fingerprint or face ID information directly.

Important
First Party Collection Information

text: 9. Provide you/display payment, loan, financial management, insurance and other financial products/services

When you use the financial product/service provided/displayed on the Meituan, we may also collect your ID information (including shadow prints), bank card information, etc. For specific information collection and useSpecific service protocol/file/rules and the "Meituan Financial Privacy Policy" in the attachment.

First Party Collection Information

text: In order to ensure the service experience and processing service disputes, when you call or answer the number of the number protection (privacy) during the performance of the order, the call information of you and the rider may be recorded.

First Party Collection Information
Usage

text: The collection and use rules of the above information are as follows, or see the prompt content in the order page.
(1) After authorization, when you have a service dispute with the merchant and the rider, the platform can retrieve and use recording information as the basis for the reference of the dispute.
label: Important
Usage

text: (2) The platform will effectively ensure the privacy and security of the two parties. The recording will be uploaded to the Meituan server to save, and all parties cannot download, retrieve or play recording by themselves;
label: Data Retention
Important
Data Security
rewrite: The call recording of you and the merchant will be uploaded to the Meituan server to save, and all parties cannot download, retrieve or play recording by themselves.

text: Except for the following circumstances, the platform will not provide the recording to anyone (including the master of the call, the name of the call): a.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important

text: b. The recording of the legal documents issued by the judicial organs was retrieved according to law.

text: (3) After 7 days of preservation, the recording will automatically delete permanently. In case of bad reviews, complaints, disputes that have not been completed, the platform will appropriately extend the periodic of the recording preservation.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: After 7 days of preservation, the recording will automatically delete permanently. If there are poor reviews, complaints, disputes that have not been handled, etc., the preservation period is appropriately extended.

text: 12. Provide you with security guarantee

In order to ensure your account security, transaction security, and system operation security, to meet the requirements of laws and regulations and our agreement rules, in the process of accessing and using our products/service, you will obtain your device information, network information, network information, network information, network information, networkStatus information, including the device model, hardware serial number, device MAC address, unique device recognition code (such as IMEI/Android/IDFA/Openudid/Guid/OAID, SIM card IMSI, ICCID information and other device identifiers),Software characteristics such as mobile application list, WIFI status, telecommunications operator and other software.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Data Security
Usage
rewrite: In the process of visiting and using our products/service, you authorize us to obtain your equipment information and network status information.

text: Without your authorization, we will not obtain the above information in advance.

In order to improve the security of the services you provide, and to prevent fraud and Trojan virus more accurately, we may use or integrate your personal information, as well as our related parties and partners to obtain information you authorize or shared according to law.Based on your habits and common software information, you can comprehensively judge your account number and transaction risk, including verifying your identity, preventing, discovering, and investigating possible security risks such as fraud, network virus, and cyber attacks that violate us or related party agreements,Policies or rules to protect the legitimate rights and interests of you, other users, or we or related parties, and record some links ("url") that we think are risky.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Data Security
Usage
rewrite: We may use or integrate your personal information and information that you authorize or shared according to law to improve the security of the service.

Important

text: Nine, Appendix:
1. Personal information: Various information related to recognized or recognized natural persons recorded in electronics or other methods, excluding information after anonymous processing.
Personal information that may involve in this privacy policy includes, but not limited to: personal information (including name, phone number, gender, address, birthday, birthday, etc.);
Personal identity information (including ID cards, officers, passports, driving licenses, etc.);
Network identity identification information (including system accounts, IP addresses, mailbox addresses, and the answer to the aforementioned password, password, password protection);
Personal property information (including bank accounts, transactions and consumption records, credit records, and virtual property information, etc.);
Personal health and physiological information (including diseases, medical records, history, etc.);
Contact information (including address book information, friends list, etc.);
Personal Internet records (including website browsing records, click records, etc.);
Personal device information (including information that describes the basic situation of individual equipment such as the unique device identification code);
Personal location information (including the trajectory, precise positioning information, accommodation information, etc.).

2. Sensitive personal information: It refers to personal information that can easily cause the personality and dignity of natural people to be violated or harmed by personal and property security once leaked or illegally used.

Personal sensitive information that may be involved in this privacy policy includes: personal identity certification information (including ID cards, officers, passports, driving licenses, student IDs, etc.);
Personal property information (bank account, transaction and consumption records, credit records, virtual property information, etc.);
Other information (whereabouts, address book information, accommodation information, accurate positioning information, medical health information, biometric information, etc.);
Under 14 years old, minor information.

3. Meituan: The "Meituan" referred to in this policy refers to all companies under Meituan and its affiliated companies (including Meituan.com, Public Comment, Mobike and other platforms that have established companies and the future.Established).

Popular comment: Refers to the life service information platform under the Meituan of Shanghai Hantao Information Consulting Co., Ltd., including but not limited to the popular Internet platforms such as Public Comment Network, Public Comment Client, and Public Comment Mini Program.
4. Related company: refers to Meituan related companies disclosed by Meituan's latest listed company annual report.
